title: Rav Landau Slams Draft Law
body: Rav Dov Landau sharply criticized growing governmental pressure and legal uncertainty surrounding the draft law and official status of yeshiva students in Yerushalayim address.

title: Rav Schreiber Publishes New Sefer
body: Rav Yisroel Bunim Schreiber releases new sefer, Nesiv Binah, on Perek Eilu Tereifos, written during his illness and treatments, at Yeshivas Nesiv HaDaas in Yerushalayim.
